name: The Weeknd
bio: Canadian singer, songwriter, and record producer known for his dark, atmospheric music.

name: Ed Sheeran
bio: English singer-songwriter known for his acoustic guitar-driven pop songs.

name: Billie Eilish
bio: American singer-songwriter known for her unique style and haunting vocals.
albums: When We All Fall Asleep, Where Do We Go?

name: Harry Styles
bio: English singer, songwriter, and actor, former member of One Direction.

name: Dua Lipa
bio: English singer and songwriter known for her disco-influenced pop music.
